title: Frivolous lawsuits
context: [ยง165-5] Frivolous lawsuits. Any nuisance action, found to be frivolous by the court, in which a farming operation is alleged to be a nuisance as defined in section 165-2, shall be governed by section 607-14.5. [L 1993, c 162, pt of ยง1] Cross References Vexatious litigants, see chapter 634J.
